```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(greta) # remotes::install_github("greta-dev/greta")
```


```{r}
data <- read_csv("../data/slow.csv")
data %>% ggplot(aes(t,x)) + geom_point()
```


```{r}
x_t1 <- data$x[-1]
x_t <- data$x[-100]



tibble(x_t, x_t1) %>% ggplot(aes(x_t, x_t1)) + geom_point()
```

```{r}
# constants
r <- 0.05 
#K <- 2 
Q <- 5
H <- 0.38
sigma <- 0.01
# Priors
a <- 0
K <- uniform(0, 10)
#H <- uniform(0,  2 * 0.38)
#a <- uniform(0, 2 * 0.0233)
#sigma <- normal(0, 2 * 0.01)

# Model
mean <- r * x_t * (1 - x_t / K) - a * x_t ^ Q / (x_t ^ Q + H ^ Q)
distribution(x_t1) <- normal(mean, 1/sigma^2)
m <- model(K)
```

```{r}
draws <- mcmc(m, n_samples = 1000, warmup = 1000, chains = 4)
```

```{r}
bayesplot::mcmc_trace(draws)
```

```{r}
summary(draws)
```
